com.leestone.twittermention
Class Variables

java.lang.Object
  com.leestone.twittermention.Variables

public class Variables
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds all the variables used throughout the program in one easy to update location.
Important: You must set all the relevant variables in here first.

Author:
Lee Stone
Date Created:
23rd December 2009
Last Updated:
23rd December 2009

TWITTER_PAGING_MODE

public static final int TWITTER_PAGING_MODE
Twitter Paging Mode:
1: Count - Gets the number of mentions defined by TWITTER_PAGING_COUNT
2: Since Last Id - Gets the mentions since the last recorded ID

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TWITTER_PAGING_COUNT

public static final int TWITTER_PAGING_COUNT
The number of mention updates to get when using Count for Paging

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SEND_MODE

public static final int SEND_MODE
Send Mode:
1: SMS - This is the normal operation mode
2: Email - Used for testing to save SMS Credit
3: Both - Send Email & SMS
4: Do Nothing - This will still process Tweets

See Also:

public static final int SMS_MODE
SMS Mode:
1: Betavine - Sends the SMS via the Betavine API

BETAVINE_DEV_KEY

public static final java.lang.String BETAVINE_DEV_KEY
Betavine Developer Key. Allows you to get the same response as sending an SMS but without using credit
